tp:struct.name: Property_Spec
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (property ID, property name, D-Bus signature, flags) representing a property, as returned by ListProperties on the Properties interface.

tp:struct.name: Property_Flags_Change
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (property ID, flags) representing a change to a property's flags, as seen in the PropertyFlagsChanged signal on the Properties interface.

tp:simple-type.name: Property_ID
tp:simple-type.tp:docstring: An unsigned integer used to represent a Telepathy property.

tp:struct.name: Property_Value
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct (property ID, value) representing a property's value, as seen in the PropertiesChanged signal on the Properties interface, returned by the GetProperties method and passed to the SetProperties method.

method.name: GetProperties
method.tp:docstring: Returns an array of (identifier, value) pairs containing the current values of the given properties.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.InvalidArgument
tp:error.tp:docstring: Some property identifier requested is invalid

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Error.PermissionDenied
tp:error.tp:docstring: Some property requested does not have the PROPERTY_FLAG_READ flag

method.name: ListProperties
method.tp:docstring: Returns a dictionary of the properties available on this channel.

arg.tp:docstring:
An array of structs containing:
an integer identifier
a string property name
a string representing the D-Bus signature of this property
a bitwise OR of the flags applicable to this property

signal.name: PropertiesChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when the value of readable properties has changed.

tp:docstring.p: The array should contain only properties whose values have actually changed.

signal.name: PropertyFlagsChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when the flags of some room properties have changed.

ul.li: a bitwise OR of the current flags

tp:docstring.p: The array should contain only properties whose flags have actually changed.

Takes an array of (identifier, value) pairs containing desired values to set the given properties. In the case of any errors, no properties will be changed. When the changes have been acknowledged by the server, the PropertiesChanged signal will be emitted.

All properties given must have the PROPERTY_FLAG_WRITE flag, or PermissionDenied will be returned. If any variants are of the wrong type, NotAvailable will be returned. If any given property identifiers are invalid, InvalidArgument will be returned.

arg.name: Properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping integer identifiers to boxed values

tp:docstring.p: Interface for channels and other objects, to allow querying and setting properties. ListProperties returns which properties are valid for the given channel, including their type, and an integer handle used to refer to them in GetProperties, SetProperties, and the PropertiesChanged signal. The values are represented by D-Bus variant types, and are accompanied by flags indicating whether or not the property is readable or writable.
Each property also has a flags value to indicate what methods are available. This is a bitwise OR of PropertyFlags values.
